## Quarto

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
View(diamonds)



names (diamonds)

dim(diamonds)

summary(diamonds)
```

```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}

ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot (data = diamonds, aes( x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
